message: Let's be fair, Bob. I propose a 60/40 split.
I think I deserve a bit more, considering the inflation
The inflation is hitting us both, Bob.  I'll take a small hit from my previous offer, but let's close this deal.
Inflation is hurting you more, I'll take a bit more this time
Bob, this is getting ridiculous.  We're losing more to inflation with every round.  Let's just split it evenly and call it a day.
